channel.title: The English Behind Scripts
channel.description:
Ok then, Scripts arnt all really that complicated, I mean, it's basicly english, lets see. Lets take a simple Powerminer
Example Code:
[code]
Program Powerminer; {.include Si.scar}
Var x,y : Integer;
Procedure mine; Begin repeat if(Findcolor(x,y,54323,5,5,515,340))then begin Mouse(x,y,1,1,true) Wait(5000) until(incincount=28) end;
Begin setrun(true); Repeat mine; dropall; until(false) end. [/code]
Ok then, what this means in english is:
[code]This Program will be called PowerMiner {.Let me use all my lovely outdated functions please}
And my X and Y too, They are Whole Numbers.
How to Mine. Begin and repeat this If you find this color then begin, Move your mouse to and click this color once. Wait 5000 miliseconds. repeat, Until (The inventory has 28 items in it).
Hi, im a main Loop. Begin Set it to run mode Repeat this Howtomine procedure; Dropall procedure; Repeat this until NEVER End of Script. [/code]
This should be useful in getting to understand what your scripts actually do, Rather than knowing its just a bunch of confusing code.
Retard/Akuma
To be updated soon.
Msn= Retard@fagex.net

item.title: The English Behind Scripts
item.dc:creator: @Akuma Akuma
item.description:
@Akuma wrote:

Nope, Until(false) is like, Until never.

Your thinking repeat forever 0_-

Read full topic

item.title: The English Behind Scripts
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Repeat this until NEVER

Don’t you mean…

Repeat this until FOREVER

lol. But yeah it’s simple English I guess.

Read full topic

item.title: The English Behind Scripts
item.dc:creator: @Akuma Akuma
item.description:
@Akuma wrote:

Ok then, Scripts arnt all really that complicated, I mean, it’s basicly english, lets see.
Lets take a simple Powerminer

Example Code:


Program Powerminer;
{.include Si.scar}

Var x,y : Integer;

Procedure mine;
Begin
repeat
if(Findcolor(x,y,54323,5,5,515,340))then
begin
Mouse(x,y,1,1,true)
Wait(5000)
until(incincount=28)
end;

Begin
setrun(true);
Repeat
mine;
dropall;
until(false)
end.

Ok then, what this means in english is:

[code]This Program will be called PowerMiner
{.Let me use all my lovely outdated functions please}

And my X and Y too, They are Whole Numbers.

How to Mine.
Begin and repeat this
If you find this color then begin,
Move your mouse to and click this color once.
Wait 5000 miliseconds.
repeat, Until (The inventory has 28 items in it).

Hi, im a main Loop.
Begin
Set it to run mode
Repeat this
Howtomine procedure;
Dropall procedure;
Repeat this until NEVER
End of Script.
[/code]

This should be useful in getting to understand what your scripts actually do, Rather than knowing its just a bunch of confusing code.

Retard/Akuma

To be updated soon.

Msn= Retard@fagex.net

Read full topic
